item.title: DrupalCamp Western Mass
item.description: I will be presenting on 2 topics. Using a VM for development the url can be seen below. http://drupalcampma.com/virtual-box-ubuntu-local-development-strategy jQuery/Ajax without using the Drupal FAPI http://drupalcampma.com/using-jquery-and-ajax-outside-drupal-fapi Though this drupal backbone session looks great! http://drupalcampma.com/drupal-and-backbonejs
